message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own this unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1300000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to offer $1250000 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1325000.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $1275000 for the product.
I appreciate your increased offer, Bob. However, I'm still a bit below my target. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $1300000, which is closer to my minimum price.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I am willing to pay $1280000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at the halfway point between your latest offer and my minimum price. I'll offer the product to you for $1290000.
